name: 黃昭勳
objective:
1. Tension, Compression, and Shear
2. Axially Loaded Members
3. Torsion
4. Shear Forces and Bending Moments

3-5 Axially Loaded Members
6-8 Torsion
10-12 Shear Forces and Bending Moments
13-15 Stresses in Beams
16-17 Analysis of Stress and Strain
materials: Mechanics of Materials, 6tth Ed., James M. Gere, Brooks/Cole.
